data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Inter get the game underway.
Inter to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Napoli at Giuseppe Meazza.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Napoli.
Paolo Valeri signals a Napoli throw-in in Inter's half.
In the minute 5, Napoli needs to be cautious. Inter have an attacking throw-in.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
Throw-in Inter.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Inter.
Ball safe as Napoli is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Inter's Danilo D`Ambrosio has run offside.
In the minute 11, Goal! Danilo D`Ambrosio gives Inter a 1-0 lead in Milan.
Cristiano Biraghi with an assist there.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Napoli drive forward but Arek Milik is judged offside.
Napoli's Arek Milik is whistled for offside at Giuseppe Meazza.
Samir Handanovic is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 17, Samir Handanovic is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli gets in a strike, but is off target.
Paolo Valeri awards Inter a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Important block from the Napoli defence as Alessandro Bastoni fires in a strike for Inter.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli.
In the minute 22, Alexis Sanchez for Inter has been booked by Paolo Valeri and receives a first yellow card.
Paolo Valeri awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 24, Matteo Politano has recovered and rejoins the match in Milan.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Inter.
Paolo Valeri waits before resuming play because Matteo Politano for Napoli is still down.
Piotr Zielinski for Napoli drives towards goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Napoli's Mario Rui gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Inter have a goal kick.
Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Napoli at Giuseppe Meazza.
Napoli pushes forward through Matteo Politano, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 31, Paolo Valeri signals a Napoli throw-in in Inter's half.
Free kick for Inter in their own half.
Napoli push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Lorenzo Insigne gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Inter defence.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Paolo Valeri blows against Inter's Alexis Sanchez for offside.
In the minute 40, Eljif Elmas (Napoli) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
Napoli's Piotr Zielinski gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Inter defender.
In the minute 41, In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Napoli are pushing forward but Nikola Maksimovic's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Inter drives forward and Marcelo Brozovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Inter.
In Milan, Borja Valero of Inter is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Free kick Napoli.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) has received a first yellow card.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Napoli kick-off.
In the minute 46, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Inter.
In the minute 47, Inter to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
Napoli's Mario Rui breaks free at Giuseppe Meazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
In the minute 48, Romelu Lukaku (Inter) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Napoli.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
In the minute 50, Inter to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
In Milan, Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 52, Mario Rui for Napoli gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Paolo Valeri awards Inter a goal kick.
Napoli's Lorenzo Insigne gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Inter defender.
In the minute 54, In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Inter in the half of Napoli.
In the minute 55, Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Nicolo Barella (Inter) gets a yellow card.
Paolo Valeri signals a Inter throw-in in Napoli's half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lautaro Martinez is on a sub for Alexis Sanchez for Inter.
Antonio Conte (Inter) is making a second substitution, with Diego Godin replacing Antonio Candreva.
In the minute 61, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Milan Inter's Danilo D`Ambrosio is caught offside.
Napoli drive upfield and Eljif Elmas gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Inter defender.
In the minute 64, Napoli's Eljif Elmas misses with an attempt on goal.
Inter have a goal kick.
The away team replace Piotr Zielinski with Allan.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Mario Rui with Faouzi Ghoulam. This is the second substitution made today by Gennaro Gattuso.
Paolo Valeri awards the home team a throw-in.
In Milan Inter attack through Cristiano Biraghi. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Napoli at Giuseppe Meazza.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Napoli.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
In the minute 70, Arek Milik (Napoli) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Throw-in Inter.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Inter.
It's now 2-0 in Milan as Lautaro Martinez scores for Inter.
Gennaro Gattuso is making the team's third substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Hirving Lozano replacing Matteo Politano.
In the minute 76, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Cristiano Biraghi is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Inter at Giuseppe Meazza.
Paolo Valeri signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Hirving Lozano (Napoli) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ashley Young is replacing Cristiano Biraghi for Inter at Giuseppe Meazza.
Throw-in high up the field for Inter in Milan.
In the minute 83, Paolo Valeri signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Inter's area.
In the minute 84, Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Inter's half?
Napoli make their fourth substitution with Jose Callejon replacing Arek Milik.
Kevin Malcuit is on a sub for Elseid Hysaj for Napoli.
Inter awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Inter.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Victor Moses is replacing Romelu Lukaku for the home team.
Antonio Conte is making the team's fifth substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Christian Eriksen replacing Borja Valero.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Paolo Valeri.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Milan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
Free kick in a good position for Inter!
Inter's Christian Eriksen gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Diego Godin for Inter is whistled offside.
Paolo Valeri awards Inter a goal kick.
Ball safe as Napoli is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has come to a close in Milan. The final score is 2-0.
The match at Giuseppe Meazza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Nikola Maksimovic, who is down injured.
